twoSetSkill.name: Charging Shield 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Receives a shield when an entity summoned by the host is attacked. When active, the shield provides 50% Total DMG Reduction against incoming attacks and lasts 7s. CD: 21s.

threeSetSkill.name: Explosion Armor 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: The Charging Shield explodes when broken, dealing 500% ATK of Physical DMG to surrounding enemies in a large AOE.
